Stephen Elop kirjoitti Nokian henkil?st?lle Engadgetin mukaan seuraavaa: Our competitors aren't taking our market share with devices; they are taking our market share with an entire ecosystem. This means we're going to have to decide how we either build, catalyse or join an ecosystem. that Eric Schmidt could become the Chief Executive of Apple Inc., whose CEO Steve Jobs has gone on an indefinite medical leave and Chief Operating Officer Tim Cook has been taking care of day to day operations,'' Raman reports. At first thought, Eric Schmidt moving to Apple would rather seem unlikely, but not impossible either.` While not necessarily likely, we think this scenario is at least a possibility,' Jefferies analyst Peter Misek wrote in his note to clients... Misek said` Apple's future is likely to increasingly overlap with Google in the areas of cloud computing, advertising, and content. to speed up decision-making at the Internet giant. In a regulatory filing last week, Google said that Eric Schmidt in December drew up a plan to sell some of his stock in the company. The pre-arranged trading plan was adopted in order to allow Eric Schmidt to sell a portion of his Google stock as part of his long-term strategy for individual asset diversification and liquidity, the filing said. The objects missing from the famed museum included`` a gilded wood statue of the 18th Dynasty king Tutankhamun being carried by a goddess'' and parts of a gilded wood statue of Tutankhamun harpooning, Zahi Hawass said in a statement.
